oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stabilization of alpha-Li2SO4 at lower temperatures

SUNITA, P

SHYAMALA, S

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: transport
lithium sulphate
ionic conductivity
habit modifiers
borax and stabilization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report here on the effect of borax, a known modifier, on the conductivity of lithium sulphate. Even with 2 m/o borax, XRD suggests the formation of LiNaSO4. A conductivity enhancement in excess of two orders of magnitude is observed with 10-12 m/o borax. With 15 m/o borax, alpha- Li2SO4 could be stabilized at 764 K.
